1122886357536391170.text:
Big event tomorrow: We have @yoshuawuyts talking about the runtime crate, and @linclark about WASI. The doors are opening at 7pm with fresh bagle sandwiches, with talks starting around 7.30pm.

100 people signed up, so first come first serve https://www.meetup.com/Rust-Berlin/events/szgnqqyzgbfc/ …

1123444842586157061.text: I think my objection to the commons clause style licenses is solidifying around them being punitive - they don't help the ecosystem as a whole or provide meaningful solutions to the underlying problem, they just exist to support a specific business model

1122833054332907526.text: I just published A close touch with Rust communityhttps://link.medium.com/6jJNaMxthW

1123187661597040640.text: Schedule time for refactoring & testing or your codebase will schedule it for you.

1122895839960141825.text: Oh, and of course, @hobofan is as well. We will hear more about cargo-nono from him

1122298594135027712.text:
Well-crafted drama features scenes that are suspenseful whether or not you already know what’s going to happen. 

The triumph of anti-spoiler culture is a triumph for mediocrity.

1123219236854349825.text: RT @opencpu: Mozilla provides $25k grant for research project on compiling (parts of) R into WebAssembly. Apply by May 31.https://mozilla-research.forms.fm/mozilla-research-grants-2019h1/forms/6510 …

1123103736858124288.text:
Until next time, Berlin.

I had a great time at @OxidizeConf . I met awesome folks and had lots of interesting conversations.

Thanks @bitshiftmask @Argorak and everyone else involved in the organization for making this happen and I'm looking forward to the next edition!

1123213911589892098.text: We've taken the "bigger is better" approach to stickers at @FerrousSystems. Here is @Xylakant showing off his company spirit! Let us know if you want one for your laptop, large vehicle, billboard, or spaceship!pic.twitter.com/MSWn5IHaF9

1122660132473769989.text: A first draft of a moderation guide (bible?) for Matrix is up at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1GodW0ONnp3dmg0MGfcvGXgn_oqD3jsmmvPC2nLCHdvM … (disclaimer: not yet reviewed; prolly incomplete). Thoughts welcome! It'll make its way onto http://matrix.org/docs/guides  when done.

1122901086808023040.text: I have now run 6 @rustlang conferences totalling a full number of 20 days.

1123447165743980544.text: Is there a good and reasonable calendar of high holidays (preferably in iCal form)?

1031651918651826176.text: Here's a deal: I will promote all your conferences, but I will only link to the accessibility page. It must be a linkable page or section.

1123160859830882304.text:
<3 to @rustbeltrust, kicked of and organized by @Carols10cents and friends. Happening Oct 18th/19th! The other classic Rust conference, even if it happens in a region that is already oxidized! Follow them for CFP announcement! Also, best swag!
https://rust-belt-rust.com

1123160863312158722.text: Finally, @rustfest has skipped a beat and is coming back later this year for its 6th edition, in beautiful Barcelona! CFP and date announcement soon, but if you consider sponsoring (maybe even the next stretch of editions for a rebate), be in touch!https://barcelona.rustfest.eu

1123160853317079040.text:
Okay, enjoyed @OxidizeConf and @RustConAsia? Here's what comes next in @rustlang conferencing.

All of them are searching for speakers, sponsors and, above all: attendees!

If you want to promote your specific flavour of Rust, all of them are interested in your talks!

(thread)

1122900995166625792.text: Organising @oxidizeconf with @bitshiftmask has been tons of fun and thanks for everyone who helped. Also, I may just go to sleep early today.
